description: This file defines a React (using Preact) component for a Tic Tac Toe game, including game state management, AI logic, UI rendering, and styling.

methods.name: calculateWinner
methods.description: Determines if there is a winner or a draw in the current game board.

methods.name: updateScores
methods.description: Updates the game scores based on the game result.

methods.name: handleMove
methods.description: Handles a player's move on the game board.

methods.name: aiChooseMove
methods.description: Decides the AI's move based on simple heuristics.

methods.name: resetBoard
methods.description: Resets the game board for a new round.

methods.name: newMatch
methods.description: Resets the game for a new match, including scores.
